text_blocks.content: Psychological Reconstruction - Epstein #76318-054: Due Date: November 1, 2019

From NERO/Regional Director~ To James Petrucci (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Ray Ormond Date 2019/09/17 17:59 Subject: Psychological Reconstruction - Epstein #76318-054: Due Date: November 1, 2019 Attachments: TEXT.htm, Psych Reconst - Epstein #76318-054.pdf

Warden Petrucci - See attached. Please provide a written response, no later than November 1, 2019, which outlines corrective actions as well as a plan for implementation, based on the recommendations contained in the attached report.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email with a clear subject and attachments. The content is related to a psychological reconstruction report for Epstein #76318-054. The document has been redacted in some areas, indicated by (b)(6); (b)(7)(C).
